eventName: Adventure That Cannot Wait for the Sun
storyInfo: Pepe destroys Zubayr's gem and stops the constructs' rampage. The treasure of Narantuya's dreams sinks into the crack beneath the city.

attributes.content: Pepe opens her eyes and sees Zubayr's sistrum, inches away from breaking her neck in half.
Meanwhile, her hammer is pressed against Zubayr's chest, leaving a long crack in the gem on his chest.
Congratulations, Pepe...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: You did it.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I could never beat my big sister when we played hide-and-seek. Some things never change, even after so many centuries.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: The gem on your chest...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: This time... I think it's beyond repair.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: What will happen to you if it's completely shattered?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Eternal peace.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: You'll die.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Yes... I will.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: As your ancestor, may I ask a favor of you, Pepe?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: What favor?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Can you take me into that gem?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: It's hollow? I thought it was just decorative.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: No, there is something there that belongs to me, and me alone.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Thanks to them, I could say that all the years I spent guarding this place were not entirely for the sake of others.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Some of those days belonged to me.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I'll help you up...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Careful, Pepe, this vessel is heavy. But I'll be free of it soon.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Yes, stand beneath it.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Pepe helps Zubayr into the middle of the hall, underneath the massive gem.
Light and shadows dance, as the massive gem draws all the illumination in the room towards its base, converging at its tip.
Though it should be blinding, Pepe feels like she is being wrapped in warm, gentle currents.
I see it, young Nightzmora. This is your own dream.
Go forward.
...Huh?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: This feels familiar... as if the beckbeast is stepping on my head again.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: —Hmm?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Hey, Anat, where am I? Aspasia, do you hear me?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: ...Should have known. The comm's broken.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: She sits up underneath a black beckbeast statue. The sound of water flowing echoes through the empty hall.
A massive crystal hangs from the dome, and its light reveals numerous images of people, like reflections in water.
Isn't that the shadow I was chasing by the river the other night?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Are these shadows what the people of the city see, year after year?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: One of the figures stops before her.
Narantuya seems to recognize the red hair, and the haughty demeanor of the figure looking down at her.
The figure turns around and walks through a closed door at the end of the hall.
Your hair's pretty red, but I had to see your back to guess that you may be someone I knew.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: After all, the Nightzmora I know all run hard on their paths, never stopping to turn around.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: What do they say? 'May those who need them find them as its waters rise.' You're the shadows that only appear when the river rises, aren't you?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Well, I need to find the leak right now. I'll count on you this once.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: The floor trembles, and the sound of falling water grows louder.
Narantuya steps through the flooded hall, running towards the armored figure.
This is—
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: On the other side of the door is neither another maze passage nor flowing sand.
Through a crack in the door, she could see treasures piled up like a mountain, glowing with a radiance that a thousand years could not dull.
But she does not even have time to exclaim.
A massive fissure appears on the floor and the entire underground structure of the city trembles violently.
The hiss of rapidly flowing sand is louder than ever. Beneath the city and right under her feet, a colossal vortex of quicksand forms.
...Come on, that's the 'leak' I'm supposed to plug?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I never thought the insides of this large gem would be anything like this.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Do you see the platform in the middle? It may be hard to see, but it's there in the center.
attributes.name: Zubayr
Pepe
attributes.content: It's dazzling, but I should be able to feel my way...

attributes.name: Pepe
attributes.content: Ouch!
attributes.joined: It's dazzling, but I should be able to feel my way...Ouch!

attributes.content: No chance I was going to see that step...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Be careful... there are three more.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I found the platform. There is a gem on it. What do I do next?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Could you take the gem from the platform and put it inside me?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Water is seeping in...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: The structural integrity of the trove has been compromised by quicksand. River water is gushing in.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: That means this place will soon be submerged.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: The river will wash away all... place the gem in my chest.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: What does the last gem represent?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Emotions. It is my emotions.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: The centuries of solitude proved too hard to endure, and I had to part ways with most of my emotions.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Your gem is broken. Putting this in won't help.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I know. I just want to depart from this realm as a human.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: You have always been human.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Ah... Thank you...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: About the City of Gold... there was something that I wanted to tell you...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Go on...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: ...Never mind.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Zubayr...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Let go, Pepe.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: You must let me go.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: As the water rises above Zubayr's face, the broken gem in his chest is shattered and washed away by the surging current.
His chest grows empty, but his eyes are filled with contentment.
He closes his eyes and sinks into the water with a smile on his face.
Pepe holds him by his shoulder, feeling him grow lighter. She realizes that it is not the water that's making him lighter.
Golden liquid flows through the gaps in her fingers. It is Zubayr's body, melting away in the water.
She instinctively tries to grab Zubayr, but what is left of his shoulder dissipates at the force.
Before long, Pepe alone remains in the water, watching as the golden current flows into the distance, carrying white lotus flowers.
May you guide his soul to rest, Horakhet.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Water pours down.
Narantuya remembers trying to catch an entire rain with the bottles in her pack when she was little.

Later, she learned that rain and drought are simply part of the cycle of life. Her tribe migrates with the weather atop their burdenbeasts; they cannot, and need not, carry so much water in their bags.

Another tremor sends the structure beneath her feet close to collapsing. Beyond the sturdy door of the trove, gold coins clatter against each other, their alluring clinks echoing the sound of her dreams.
Wish I could tell those two kitties in the museum that a hole big enough to sink a city isn't going to be plugged by a few planks.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Narantuya remembers how she dreamed about it.
If she truly owned a mountain of gold—real gold, not the gilded iron ingots that the lords ameer smelt, or the empty checks they write—the first thing she would do is dance on top of it.
That way, all the treasure will be captivated by her, and never leave her again.
Well then, let's dance.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Narantuya backs off a little bit and lifts a black beckbeast statue.
Then, she charges at the seemingly indestructible door.
Open up—!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Slowly, the door opens to her shout, and she glimpses a corner of the mountain of gold through the gap.
The mountain of gold begins to collapse as the structure tilts further and further.
Treasures beyond reckoning spill out, further widening the fissure as they crash onto the floor.
Water crashing down from above mixes with gold and sand, distorting the walls under its pressure and turning the massive treasure pile into a glittering waterfall.
The Nightzmora nimbly throws her knife and grabs onto the rope attached.
Like an elegant dancer, she swings through the air, watching as the mountain of gold cascades into the shimmering deluge.
She throws her head back and laughs.
It's not quite how I envisioned it... but I knew I wasn't delusional!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I really made it to the City of Radiance and struck gold!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Honestly, how many in all of Sargon's history have enough gold to make it rain like a waterfall?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I'll remember this sea of gold. Just as I'll remember that what I desire, I shall have.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I'll amass more gold, then I'll make it rain once more.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: When that day comes, the deserts of Sargon will remember my name!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: This—is my choice!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: The glittering begins to dim as the gold falls through the fissure and into the vortex.
The roiling sands begin to calm. The sunken treasure has filled the fissure, staunching the quicksand.
*Sargon swearing* Wait a minute.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: One less piece of treasure or two wouldn't have made a difference, right?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Why didn't I at least take one home?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Goodbye, Zubayr.
...Huh, so the trove collapsed when its guardian died. Makes sense.
So where am I?
And how am I supposed to swim myself out when you've gone with the water?
Water presses at her chest, rising above her eyes, still gently whirling, dragging her ever deeper.
She feels everything grow dark around her.
Then, someone grabs her hand.
(Thank...)
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Guess luck is on my side after all!
One last piece of treasure to take home!
H-Has it stopped?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Yes, Curator Anat. Sand isn't coming out of the taps anymore.
attributes.name: Ajazi

attributes.content: Neither is water.
attributes.name: Ajani

attributes.content: Maybe it's just clogged? Maybe things—
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Don't worry. The jewel constructs have stopped moving.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: No sign of energy from the Originium circuits... it may never wake up again.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: You were carrying that little pet of yours?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: I trust Pepe.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Well, we've done what we could...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: The chaos in the city has indeed stopped, but we can't be sure if it's over for good.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Yes. We are still anxious.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: ...We all owe your friend a great debt of gratitude.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: I promise that I will honor her deeds and Pepe's in my report, that their names will be known throughout the City of Radiance, and immortalized in the history books for posterity...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: I don't mind being known throughout the city, but I'd rather not be immortalized in the history books until I'm actually dead.
Narantuya?!
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Hey, give me a hand with this girl here.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: ...Pepe?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: She probably would've been done for if I hadn't come across her while swimming out.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I kept swimming up and ended up here.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: You look awful...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Where's Zubayr...?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Pepe turns her gaze to the pool next to her.
May you guide his soul to rest, Horakhet.
Let time flow for him again. Let us all move forward once more.
Hey! I almost drowned. Of course my face and lips are going to be a little blue.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Never mind that. Let me see my accomplishments! The sand's gone from the city, right? And the water's clean now?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: R-Right now?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: How did you get your face so dirty when you've been inside the museum all this time? Come, let's wash away that dirt!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: N-No! Not getting wet from the rain is the main reason why I don't do field work!
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Looks like I saved quite a few lives today.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: But I guess none of these kitties are competent enough to be my subordinate.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: What does a competent subordinate look like in the mind of that Kuranta?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: See, I told you Narantuya would be fine! She wouldn't have just left us here.
attributes.name: Ajani

attributes.content: Sit down, Ajani.
attributes.name: Ajazi

attributes.content: The fountain's shaky and it'll fall over if we both stand up at the same time. It's my turn to stand up now.
attributes.name: Ajazi

attributes.content: ...Perhaps someone who fears nothing, like herself.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: You too, Titi!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: It's such a fine and sunny day, isn't it?
attributes.name: Pepe
